title: Chapter 1 - It Begins - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 1 - "It Begins" Part 1
The story of survival begins. Michael Cross, 27, watches people attack each other on the way to his Army Reserve Duty station.  The situation starts to unravel as he meets up with the other two Soldiers, Saul Tink and Angel Tunudo.

title: Chapter 1 - It Begins - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 1 - "It Begins" Part 2
Michael, Angel, and Saul travel through downtown LA. They find two female survivors, Riley and Pegs on the roof of a shop, then continue toward an apartment building to hold up in.

title: Chapter 1 - It Begins - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 1 - "It Begins" Part 3
The group searches the apartment building, finding surprises around every corner. Datu, a Filipino maintenance man, describes what happened to the other people in the tower.

title: Chapter 2 - The Two Things - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 2 - "The Two Things" Part 1
The tower lobby is secured, but only for so long. Survivors on the outside try to find refuge in the tower, attracting threats to their front door.
Come back here next Monday, June 15th for part 2!

title: Chapter 2 - The Two Things - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 2 - "The Two Things" Part 2
Access to the lobby has been lost and needs to be sealed in case more come to the tower for refuge. The rest search the rooms for food and supplies, but find something else living in the tower.
Come back here next Monday, June 22nd for part 3!

title: Chapter 2 - The Two Things - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 2 - "The Two Things" Part 3
Lizzy, Riley, and Datu are trained to shoot. Pegs struggles to find a purpose as she refuses to use a gun. The other soldiers prepare the hummer for recon missions.
Come back here next Monday, July 6th for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 3 - The New Arrivals - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 3 - "The New Arrivals" Part 1
Saul and Angel are scavenging for supplies, but are coming up short. A new group of survivors are drawn to Peg’s “We’re Alive” sign hanging outside the tower.
Come back here next Monday, July 13th for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 3 - The New Arrivals - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 3 - "The New Arrivals" Part 2
A slip-up causes the survivors of the tower to be noticed. Michael scrambles to keep everyone safe while Saul and Angel discover a dying old man, Burt, out amongst the ruins.
Come back here next Monday, July 20th for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 3 - The New Arrivals - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 3 - "The New Arrivals" Part 3
Burt, Saul, and Angel meet with Michael and return to the tower to find it under siege. Using supplies from Burt’s secret stash, they turn the tides and go to find their friends inside.
Come back here next Monday, August 3rd for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 4 - Rules and Regulations - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 4 - "Rules and Regulations" Part 1
The survivors move to retake the tower floor by floor. Dissension starts to grow as Michael establishes a new set of rules for the apartment building.
Come back here next Monday, August 10th for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 4 - Rules and Regulations - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 4 - "Rules and Regulations" Part 2
The goals and jobs given to the survivors are starting to be implemented. One of the survivors becomes suddenly ill.
Come back here next Monday, August 17th for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 4 - Rules and Regulations - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 4 - "Rules and Regulations" Part 3
The events of the past have spurred a new directive: to document everything that happens in a journal. Problems is the tower lead to a small scale revolt.
Come back here next Monday, August 31st for The Next Chapter!

title: Chapter 5 - Lady and the Tink - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 5 - "Lady and the Tink" Part 1
Saul, Lizzy and Burt tell the tale of their mission to the refueling station. Along the way they find remnants of a huge battle.
Come back here next Monday, September 7th for The Next Part!

title: Chapter 5 - Lady and the Tink - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 5 - "Lady and the Tink" Part 2
Our small detachment of survivors venture to the refueling station. They decide to make a detour to see if Saul’s girl survived the attacks.
Come back next Monday, September 14th for The Next Part!

title: Chapter 5 - Lady and the Tink - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 5 - "Lady and the Tink" Part 3
Burt and Lizzy return to the fuel depot to find out what happened to Saul.
Come back in two weeks, Monday, September 28th for Chapter 6, The Remains of Eastern Bay!

title: Chapter 6 - The Remains of Eastern Bay - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 6 - "The Remains of Eastern Bay" Part 1
The fuel team heads back to the tower with the fuel truck. A couple of other suspicious survivors come in  contact with Burt, Lizzy and Saul.
Come back next Monday, October 5th for part 2!

title: Chapter 6 - The Remains of Eastern Bay - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 6 - "The Remains of Eastern Bay" Part 2
A compromise is made and our team separates. Saul follows the Mallers back to their home to find out some disturbing information.
Come back next Monday, October 12th for part 3!

title: Chapter 6 - The Remains of Eastern Bay - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 6 - "The Remains of Eastern Bay" Part 3
Saul is discovered as he makes radio contact with the tower. An onslaught of mallers and zombies stalk him as he tries to escape.
Come back next Monday, October 26th for Chapter 7!

title: Chapter 7 - Blood Sweat and Fears - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 7 - "Blood Sweat and Fears" Part 1
A new plan encourages the group to start developing bait for the zombies. Lizzy devises a plan to go to another rooftop to test her theory.
Come back next Monday, November 2nd for Part 2!

title: Chapter 7 - Blood Sweat and Fears - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 7 - "Blood Sweat and Fears" Part 2
The test continues and the team discovers what happens with their “bait”. The come up with a plan to find out where the zombies are all coming from.
Come back next Monday, November 9th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 7 - Blood Sweat and Fears - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 7 - "Blood Sweat and Fears" Part 3
Michael’s idea of tagging the zombies is underway with unforeseen consequences.
Come back Monday, November 23rd for Chapter 8!

title: Chapter 8 - Where Do You Go When You Sleep? - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 8 - "Where Do You Go When You Sleep?" Part 1
Uninvited visitors show up and stir up problems at the tower.
Come back Monday, December 7th for Part 2! We’re taking a week off for Thanksgiving.

title: Chapter 8 - Where Do You Go When You Sleep? - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 8 - "Where Do You Go When You Sleep?" Part 2
Utilities start to fail and stage 2 of Michael’s plan is underway, and decide to head towards the water pumping plant.
Come back Monday, December 14th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 8 - Where Do You Go When You Sleep? - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 8 - "Where Do You Go When You Sleep?" Part 3
The water pumping station reveals something that the survivors would never have expected. Everything starts to fall apart soon after.
Come back Monday, December 28th for Chapter 9!

title: Chapter 9 - The Road to Living Death - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 9 - "The Road to Living Death" Part 1
The mission is continued as planned. The path is littered with obstacles and zombies along the way, but someone or something very peculiar has survived.
Come back Monday, January 11th for Part 2!

title: Chapter 9 - The Road to Living Death - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 9 - "The Road to Living Death" Part 2
The recon group digs in deep as they approach the source of the trackers.
Come back Monday, January 18th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 9 - The Road to Living Death - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 9 - "The Road to Living Death" Part 3
Trapped, with few options, the remainder of the recon team set out to make up for the numerous mistakes made in the mission and head into the home of the zombies.
Come back Monday, February 1st for Chapter 10!

title: Chapter 10 - Purgatory - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 10 - "Purgatory" Part 1
Deep inside the arena our team gets a first hand look at what goes on inside the lair.
Come back Monday, February 8th for Part 2!

title: Chapter 10 - Purgatory - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 10 - "Purgatory" Part 2
Behind enemy lines, the team struggles to keep optimism and regain control in what is a hopeless situation.
Come back Monday, February 15th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 10 - Purgatory - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 10 - "Purgatory" Part 3
The fires are lit in the center of the arena, as the guards return to the prisoners.
Come back Monday, March 1st for Chapter 11!

title: Chapter 11 - R&R - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 11 - "Rest and Recreation" Part 1
The rescue team returns to the tower.
Come back Monday, March 8th for Part 2!

title: Chapter 11 - R&R - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 11 - "Rest and Recreation" Part 2
The survivors search out the thief as Kalani describes his experience at the other tower.
Come back Monday, March 15th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 11 - R&R - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 11 - "Rest and Recreation" Part 3
In the shadow of disaster, the tower takes some well needed Rest and Rehabilitation.
Come back Monday, March 29th for the start of the 4 Part Season Finale!

title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 1 of 4
description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 1
The Tower stands, alone and surrounded.
Come back Monday, April 5th for part 2 of the Season Finale!

title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 2 of 4
description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 2
The Mallers attack the tower.
Come back Monday, April 12th for part 3 of the Season Finale!

title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 3 of 4
description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 3
The Mallers continue to attack the tower.
Come back Monday, April 19th for the final part of the Season Finale!

title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 4 of 4
description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 4
The Season 1 Finale of “We’re Alive”.
Come back August 2010 for the Season 2 of We’re Alive!

title: Chapter 13 - Separate Dying Embers - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 13 - "Separate Dying Embers" Part 1
The survivors are trapped in their fortress, trying to find a way out.
Come back August 30th for Part 2!

title: Chapter 13 - Separate Dying Embers - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 13 - "Separate Dying Embers" Part 2
A Clue left behind sparks a new hope for the survivors.
Come back September 6th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 13 - Separate Dying Embers - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 13 - "Separate Dying Embers" Part 3
The war continues both in and outside the tower.
Come back September 20th for Chapter 14!

title: Chapter 14 - Out of the Ashes - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 14 - "Out of the Ashes" Part 1
The fallout from the war comes to the surface!
Come back September 27th for Part 2!

title: Chapter 14 - Out of the Ashes - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 14 - "Out of the Ashes" Part 2
Saul’s need for medical attention comes to a head as Burt assembles a team to get the bullet out of him.
Come back October 4th for Part 3!

title: Chapter 14 - Out of the Ashes - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 14 - "Out of the Ashes" Part 3
Everyone says their last goodbyes.
Come back Monday October 18th for Chapter 15!

title: Chapter 15 - Desperate Times - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 15 - "Desperate Times" Part 1
Food, water, and tempers run short as the survivors look to find a new place to live.
Come back Monday October 25th for Part 2!

title: Chapter 15 - Desperate Times - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 15 - "Desperate Times" Part 2
Michael, Kelly, and Pegs embark south.
Come back Monday November 1st for Part 3.

title: Chapter 15 - Desperate Times - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 15 - "Desperate Times" Part 3
Michael, Kelly, and Pegs explore their new surroundings.
Come back Monday November 15th for Chapter 16.

title: Chapter 16 - Over the Air-Waves - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 16 - "Over the Air-Waves" Part 1
The beach is an inviting place...

title: Chapter 16 - Over the Air-Waves - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 16 - "Over the Air-Waves" Part 2
The Yacht off shore is explored while Kalani and Angel leave for an unexpected detour
Come back Monday December 6th for Part 3.

title: Chapter 16 - Over the Air-Waves - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 16 - "Over the Air-Waves" Part 3
Michael and Pegs are Trapped while Angel and Kalani drop off a special package.
Come back Monday December 20th for Chapter 17

title: Chapter 17 - There Might Be Others - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 17 - "There Might Be Others" Part 1
You never know what's just around the corner...
Come back Monday January 3rd for Part 2

title: Chapter 17 - There Might Be Others - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 17 - "There Might Be Others" Part 2
Angel and Kalani find something else inside the warehouse...
Come back Monday January 10th for Part 3

title: Chapter 17 - There Might Be Others - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 17 - "There Might Be Others" Part 3
Both sets of survivors find shelter from the dangers outside.
Come back Monday January 24th for Chapter 18

title: Chapter 18 - No Place Like Home - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 18 - "No Place Like Home" Part 1
Angel and Kalani plan their escape while Michael, Pegs and Kelly follow a trail further south.
Come back Monday January 31st for Part 2

title: Chapter 18 - No Place Like Home - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 18 - "No Place Like Home" Part 2
Michael, Pegs and Kelly continue on their trail.
Come back Monday February 7th for Part 3

title: Chapter 18 - No Place Like Home - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 18 - "No Place Like Home" Part 3
Angel and Kalani make their stand.
Come back Monday February 21st for Chapter 19

title: Chapter 19 - The Catalyst - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 19 - "The Catalyst" Part 1
Deep inside the colony...
Come back Monday February 28th for Part 2

title: Chapter 19 - The Catalyst - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 19 - "The Catalyst" Part 2
...the veil is pulled back further...
Come back Monday March 7th for Part 3

title: Chapter 19 - The Catalyst - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 19 - "The Catalyst" Part 3
...and everything becomes clear.
Come back Monday March 21st for Chapter 20

title: Chapter 20 - About Last Night - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 20 - "About Last Night" Part 1
At the Tower, the events of last night start to unfold.
Come back Monday March 28th for Part 2

title: Chapter 20 - About Last Night - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 20 - "About Last Night" Part 2
Saul's Condition.
Come back Monday April 4th for Part 3

title: Chapter 20 - About Last Night - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 20 - "About Last Night" Part 3
Following the breadcrumbs...
Due to the Live Event, We're Alive will return Monday April 25th for Chapter 21

title: Chapter 21 - Mark of the Beast - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 21 - "Mark of the Beast" Part 1
No one is safe...
Come back next Monday for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 21 - Mark of the Beast - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 21 - "Mark of the Beast" Part 2
Trouble in the distance...
Come back next Monday for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 21 - Mark of the Beast - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 21 - "Mark of the Beast" Part 3
To fly?
Come back May 23rd for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 22 - Our Doubts are Traitors - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 22 - "Our Doubts are Traitors" Part 1
Against all Enemies, foreign and domestic...
Come back May 30th for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 22 - Our Doubts are Traitors - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 22 - "Our Doubts are Traitors" Part 2
The other side of things-
Come back June 6th for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 22 - Our Doubts are Traitors - Part 3 of 3
description:

Somewhere to avoid-
Come back June 20th for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 23 - The Devil's Workshop - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 23 - "The Devil's Workshop" Part 1
Some things are best left alone--
Come back June 27th for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 23 - The Devil's Workshop - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 23 - "The Devil's Workshop" Part 2
No way out...
Come back July 11th for the next part of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 23 - The Devil's Workshop - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 23 - "The Devil's Workshop" Part 3
The only way out... is up.
Come back July 30th for the Season Finale of We're Alive.

title: Chapter 24 - The Harder they Fall
description:
Chapter 24 - "The Harder they Fall"
This is it...
Come back in the winter for the next Season of We're Alive.
- UPDATE - Episode updated with slight fix - March 2014.

Ashes to ashes, dust to dust…

title: Chapter 26 - Who Overcomes… - Part 2 of 3

title: Chapter 46 - Under Pressure - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 46 - "Under Pressure" Part 2 of 3
Does it work...
Come back June 2nd for the next episode!

title: Chapter 46 - Under Pressure - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 46 - "Under Pressure" Part 3 of 3
When things boil...
Come back June 16th for the next episode!

title: Chapter 47 - The Lion's Den - Part 1 of 3
description:
Chapter 47 - "The Lion's Den" Part 1 of 3
To reason why...
Come back June 23rd for the next episode!

title: Chapter 47 - The Lion's Den - Part 2 of 3
description:
Chapter 47 - "The Lion's Den" Part 2 of 3
Prepare yourself...
Come back June 30th for the next episode!
Only one more episode left until the series finale in July!

title: Chapter 47 - The Lion's Den - Part 3 of 3
description:
Chapter 47 - "The Lion's Den" Part 3 of 3
The beginning of the end…
July 19th is the finale premiere in LA, and on July 21st, the finale will be available as part of our finale download pack for $5, and then streamed LIVE on zombiepodcast.com and available on the normal podcast feed July 29th. Confused? We have all the finale details posted on Zombiepodcast.com.

title: Chapter 48 - The Ink Runs Dry - Series Finale
description:
Chapter 48 - "The Ink Runs Dry"
The end…
This is it! The final episode of We're Alive - A Story of Survival. Stay tuned on our website for our next series from Wayland Productions and our upcoming short side-episodes called "Tales from We're Alive" which will further explore the untold stories of survival. Be sure to follow us on Facebook and twitter to keep up to date on all the new happenings!

title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 1 of 6
description: We're Alive is BACK with Lockdown. Join us on this 6 part mini-series as we dive deep into Twin Towers Jail, and follow a small group of unlikely survivors as they struggle to find their way out. New episode weekly, Part 2 airs May 2nd!

title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 2 of 6
description: The Lockdown Continues... Join us for part 3, Monday May 9th, 9am PST. Join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com/forum/

title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 3 of 6
description: The Lockdown Continues... Join us for part 4, Monday May 16th, 9am PST. Join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com/forum/

title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 4 of 6
description: The Lockdown Continues... Join us for part 5, Monday May 23rd, 9am PST. Join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com/forum/

title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 5 of 6
description: The Lockdown CONCLUDES!!! Join us for the live video broadcast, streaming finale of Lockdown part 6: June 3rd LIVE starting at 6 pm PST on www.werealive.com . The finale will then debut on the podcast feed June 6th, 9am PST. So if you want to experience the finale with the rest of the fans, join in on the finale stream on Friday June 3rd! Have an idea on how it will all end? Join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com/forum/

title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 6 of 6 - The Finale
description:
The finale for Lockdown is here! Stay tuned for more content from Wayland Productions, including our next mini-series "We're Alive: Goldrush"!
For updates on new episodes, follow us on social media, and join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com

title: We're Alive, A Preview of Things to come...
description: We're Alive has reached 50 million downloads! To commemorate the occasion, here's a sneak peak at the upcoming continuations in the series. Be sure to check out the website www.werealive.com to see our web store re-opening with a brand new special poster!
